text: "All Through the Night" is a song by American singer Cyndi Lauper. It is off her first album, She's So Unusual. It is a synthpop song written by Jules Shear and produced by Rick Chertoff. This was the only single by Lauper released worldwide which did not have a music video. It peaked at #5 on the Billboard Hot 100. It became her fourth top-five song in the United States. The song received mostly positive reviews from critics. It was released in September 1984 in the United States. ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Cyndi Lauper songs
title: All Through the Night
